Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.linux

Defines a Java object model for the OVAL Linux components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DpkgInfoItem The dpkginfo item stores DPKG package info.
DpkgInfoObject The dpkginfo object is used by a dpkginfo test to define the object to be evaluated.
DpkgInfoState The dpkginfo state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified DPKG package.
DpkgInfoTest The dpkginfo test is used to check information for a given DPKG package.
EntityItemProtocolType The EntityStateProtocolType complex type restricts a string value to the set of physical layer protocols used by AF_PACKET sockets.
EntityItemRpmVerifyResultType The EntityItemRpmVerifyResultType restricts a string value to the set of possible outcomes of checking an attribute of a file included in an RPM against the actual value of that attribute in the RPM database.
EntityStateProtocolType The EntityStateProtocolType restricts a string value to the set of physical layer protocols used by AF_PACKET sockets.
EntityStateRpmVerifyResultType The EntityStateRpmVerifyResultType restricts a string value to the set of possible outcomes of checking an attribute of a file included in an RPM against the actual value of that attribute in the RPM database.
FileBehaviors The FileBehaviors defines a number of behaviors that allow a more detailed definition of a set of files or file related items to collect.
IfListenersItem An iflisteners_item stores the results of checking for applications that are bound to an interface on the system.
IfListenersObject The iflisteners_object element is used by an iflisteners_test to define the specific interface to be evaluated.
IfListenersState The iflisteners_state element defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified applications that are listening on interfaces on the system.
IfListenersTest The iflisteners_test is used to check what applications such as packet sniffers that are bound to an interface on the system.
InetListeningServersItem An inet listening server item stores the results of checking for network servers currently active on a system.
InetListeningServersObject The inetlisteningservers object is used by an inet listening servers test to define the specific protocol-address-port to be evaluated.
InetListeningServersState The inetlisteningservers state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified inet listening server.
InetListeningServersTest The inet listening servers test is used to check what applications are listening on the network.
LinuxEvrPkgInfoItem  
LinuxEvrPkgInfoState  
LinuxPkg  
LinuxPkgInfoItem  
LinuxPkgInfoObject  
LinuxPkgInfoState  
PartitionItem The partition item stores information about a partition on the local system.
PartitionObject The partition object is used by a partition test to define which partitions on the local system should be collected.
PartitionState The partition state defines the different information associated with a partition.
PartitionTest The partition test is used to check the information associated with partitions on the local system.
RpmInfoBehaviors The RpmInfoBehaviors defines a set of behaviors for controlling what data, for installed rpms, is collected.
RpmInfoItem The rpminfo item stores rpm info.
RpmInfoObject The rpminfo object is used by a rpminfo test to define the object to be evaluated.
RpmInfoState The rpminfo state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified rpm.
RpmInfoTest The rpminfo test is used to check the RPM header information for a given RPM package.
RpmVerifyBehaviors Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.10: Replaced by the RpmVerifyFileBehaviors and the RpmVerifyPackageBehaviors and will be removed in version 6.0 of the language.
RpmVerifyFileBehaviors The RpmVerifyFileBehaviors defines a set of behaviors that for controlling how the individual files in installed rpms are verified.
RpmVerifyFileItem This item stores the verification results of the individual files in an RPM similar to what is produced by the rpm -V command.
RpmVerifyFileObject The rpmverifyfile_object is used by a rpmverifyfile_test to define a set of files within a set of RPMs to verify.
RpmVerifyFileState The rpmverifyfile_state defines the different information that can be used to determine if a set of files within a set of RPMs passed verification.
RpmVerifyFileTest The rpmverifyfile_test is used to verify the integrity of the individual files in installed RPMs.
RpmVerifyItem Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.10: Replaced by the rpmverifyfile item and rpmverifypackage item and will be removed in version 6.0 of the language.
RpmVerifyObject Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.10: Replaced by the rpmverifyfile object and rpmverifypackage object and will be removed in version 6.0 of the language.
RpmVerifyPackageBehaviors The RpmVerifyPackageBehaviors complex type defines a set of behaviors that for controlling how installed rpms are verified.
RpmVerifyPackageItem This item stores the rpm verification results of an rpm similar to what is produced by the rpm -V command.
RpmVerifyPackageObject The rpmverifypackage_object is used by a rpmverity_test to define a set of RPMs to verify.
RpmVerifyPackageState The rpmverifypackage_state defines the different information that can be used to verify the integrity of installed RPMs.
RpmVerifyPackageTest The rpmverifypackage_test is used to verify the integrity of installed RPMs.
RpmVerifyState Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.10: Replaced by the rpmverifyfile state and rpmverifypackage state and will be removed in version 6.0 of the language.
RpmVerifyTest Deprecated. Deprecated as of version 5.10: Replaced by the rpmverifyfile test and rpmverifyfile test and will be removed in version 6.0 of the language.
SelinuxBooleanItem This item describes the current and pending status of a SELinux boolean.
SelinuxBooleanObject The selinuxboolean object is used by an selinuxboolean test to define the items to evaluate based on a specified state.
SelinuxBooleanState The selinuxboolean state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified SELinux boolean.
SelinuxBooleanTest The selinuxboolean test is used to check the current and pending status of a SELinux boolean.
SelinuxSecurityContextItem This item describes the SELinux security context of a file or process on the local system.
SelinuxSecurityContextObject The selinuxsecuritycontext object is used by an selinuxsecuritycontext test to define the security contexts of files and processes to collect from the local system.
SelinuxSecurityContextState The selinuxsecuritycontext state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified SELinux security context.
SelinuxSecurityContextTest The selinuxsecuritycontext test is used to check the security context of a file or process on the local system.
SlackwarePkgInfoItem This item describes info related to Slackware packages.
SlackwarePkgInfoObject The slackwarepkginfo object is used by a slackware package info test to define the object to be evaluated.
SlackwarePkgInfoState The slackwarepkginfo state defines the different information that can be used to evaluate the specified package.
SlackwarePkgInfoTest The slackware package info test is used to check information associated with a given Slackware package.
 

Enum Summary
LinuxPkg.Entity  
ProtocolEnumeration Physical layer protocols used by AF_PACKET sockets
RpmVerifyResultEnumeration The set of possible outcomes of checking an attribute of a file included in an RPM against the actual value of that attribute in the RPM database.
 

Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.linux Description

Defines a Java object model for the OVAL Linux components.
